seo.title: Stage 3 – Value by Design™ (Lite Ed)
seo.description: Welcome to Your CVC + PVC Insight Engine This page is the quiet control room

body.raw:
Welcome to Your CVC + PVC Insight Engine

This page is the quiet control room where your two interview transcripts meet a pair of specialist AI analysts. While they cross-match customer pains with product gains and surface any gaps, you can simply keep the tab open—then collect a crisp, merged brief the moment the run completes.

(One-stop page for the two “deep-dive” analysis runs)

What happens on this page — in plain English

  1. We ingest your interview transcripts
    The raw audio + confirmed summaries from the CVC and PVC calls are pushed into a secure analysis thread that only you and our system can see. Our two researchers have been working quietly in the background, their comprehensive research will be surfaced to you with the help of our analysts.
  2. Two specialised analysts get to work
    • CVC Analyst distils customer jobs, pains, gains, and buying triggers.
    • PVC Analyst maps each product feature to the pains/gains it resolves and flags any gaps.
  3. Cross-check & merge
    A supervisor agent compares both outputs, highlights mismatches (“feature with no pain” or “pain with no feature”), and bundles everything into one tidy brief.
  4. Delivery
    As soon as the run shows Status: complete, you’ll receive an email titled “Your Fit Workshop is ready” with:
    • a copy of the deep research of each researcher
    • a PDF snapshot of both canvases
    • a link to the next (Fit Workshop) page, already pre-filled with your data.

What you need to do right now

Start CVC
Start PVC

Behind-the-scenes (for the curious)

  • Tech stack: OpenAI Assistants (or Responses API) + Agents SDK orchestrator
  • Security: PII-stripped transcripts; zero-retention mode on external calls; 256-bit-encrypted storage
  • Rate-limits & retries: The page auto-retries failed calls up to 3× with exponential back-off—no manual refresh required.

Troubleshooting

Final stop → Fit Workshop

Once you’ve got the confirmation email, head to the Fit Workshop page to prioritise which features, pains, and gains make the strongest market story. We’ll be waiting there with your freshly-minted canvases in hand.

Thanks for your patience—your insights are cooking!
